step1.title: Enter repo and major version
step1.text: We request tags from Docker Hub and filter them by your major version.

step2.title: Pick the best tag
step2.text: We prefer general aliases like ‚Äú17-alpine‚Äù or ‚Äú17‚Äù. If they don‚Äôt exist, we fall back to the closest available tag.

step3.title: Check aliases by digest
step3.text: We fetch the manifest digest and show all tags that point to the same image.
